thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Cyril Scott
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Cyril Scott

author: Cyril Scott
title: Cyril Scott
text: I traded in lots of my old and unused consoles plus an array of pc, Wii, ps3 and WiiU games. The staff in The store were excellent in quickly testing and processing everything and issuing a voucher. The voucher system on the web site worked seamlessly and the new goods (i-phone and game) that I ordered arrived quickly. I even got a credit for the unused amount left on the original voucher. It was all so easy and the service was great.
